page.title: 17SPORT AND LEISURE
page.content: In my spare time I read, walk, play tennis, do puzzle books and sometimes tidy my bedroom. The books I read are sort of adventures and mysteries. The book I'm reading now is called "Nancy Drew" and the authoress is Carolyn Keene. The places I go for my walks are across the fields and up to Donnington Castle. I do puzzle books as well because they keep me occupied for about half an hour. When I have any spare time I do sporty things like athletics, tennis lessons, bike riding and swimming. The athletics I do are sprinting, high jump and long jump. On Saturdays at about 5.15 pm I go to St.Barts swimming pool and have lessons for about three quarters of an hour. The strokes I swim are breast stroke, front crawl, back stroke and butterfly. My best stroke and my fastest is front crawl.
